idea:
Legalo is a platform where those who seek Business, Financial and Legal services, can connect with Lawyers, CA, CS professionals, consultants and firms. In cities where Legalo is available, you can use the Legalo Website to raise an enquiry. The platform will connect you to the best available service providers as per your requirement.

In addition to connecting users to expert legal services, we are also working to help individuals start their own companies, support existing companies & MSME s with tax, accounting and other services at a reasonable price right from pitch deck to registration and beyond as our contribution to make "Ease of Doing Business" a reality in India.
name: LEGALO EXPLORE LLP

name: SLN BROTHERS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Company Profile :


C4 Integrated Wellness, founded by Dr. Shilpa N Desai, is a wellness centre based in Mumbai, India. We operate from two state-of-the-art health centers in Juhu and Cuffe Parade.

The company aims at the health and fitness of the global community in natural and scientific ways.

We at C4 Integrated Wellness believe that the mind, body, and soul constitute one unit and therefore cater a 360-degree approach to build tenacious immunity. Our programs include Sports Preventive & Injury Management, Wellness Program, Nutrition for all age groups, Lifestyle Management, Weight Loss Management, Mental Stress Management, Aesthetic, and Pain Management ,Yoga . We cater to corporates, schools, colleges, universities, townships, clubs, and individuals.

In light of the recent pandemic of COVID-19, our healthcare facility is typically made to train our body to prevent such an invasion from a foreign body. We can come up with a plan with a whole approach along with nutrition, exercise, wellness, nutraceuticals, etc to combat a widespread disease like this in the future. 


We have been associated with institutions like Maharashtra Police Sports Academy, SRPF (State Reserve Police Force ), IIT Powai, Goregoan Sports Club, Celebration Sports Club, Utpal Sanghvi School, and G. D Somani School.

Our team of qualified doctors showcases our expertise, complemented by the latest technology and analytics, to provide customized solutions aimed at preventive healthcare. C4 Integrated Wellness has been recognized as the "Fastest Growing Brand 2018-2019" in the Wellness sector by Asia One in Singapore. 


Vision & Mission:  To provide a scientific and advanced technology-based  Health care system at an affordable price  Globally.

The objective of the Proposal :


 To deliver a complete healthcare & aesthetics solutions, through a planned Health & Wellness Care Centre manned by certified experts throughout the year. As we strongly believe that prevention is better than cure, we aim at focussing on prevention by our method of 360-degree approach.

• Making one conscious of their physical and mental health and current lifestyle

• Providing preventive and protective care for a healthier future
name: C4 Integrated Wellness Pvt Ltd

idea:
Chrysanthe Naturals was born out of a passion to create products which are sourced from nature. We have been working on our two upcoming fresh premium brands namely FLEUR FRAGRANCES - which is into Premium Aroma Oils made from Natural Oils & SOWER'S SECRETS - which is into Premium food for Skin, Hair and Body.

Every day, we make small and deliberate choices to create and develop our range of products to international standards.

Our two brands:

A) Sower’s Secrets concept was born out of pure passion, to carefully pick niche, unique organic foods locally and internationally which would be beneficial for the Skin, Hair and body. We source our produce from local producers and communities that are working on forest and agriculture produce which are natural and wild. We cater to the entire supply chain from procurement, quality check, brand, promote and sell organic products. Here you can find Green tea, Green Coffee, Cold pressed oils, Raw Honey, Nuts etc from all around the world . We work in collaboration with local farmers, beekeepers across India. We work on a few key criteria’s to be organic, to support indigenous food, to support local biodiversity and to increase local employment and reduce our carbon footprint.

B) Fleur Fragrances was born out of a pure passion for creating premium scents made from natural essential oils to invigorate your senses. We source our essential oils from the best of the world to create masterpieces using our 25 years of experience.

We are into the business of Scent marketing, a powerful yet subtle way for your company to gain your customers loyalty, whether they are in a retail location, hospitality, healthcare, office, financial institution, or any enclosed environment.

We care for our environment and strive hard to reduce our impact on the environment. Fleur Fragrances actively focuses in reducing its carbon footprint and therefore its impact on the environment. We endeavor to comply our fragrances to the stringent IFRA norms.

We have a few registered trademarks - Fleur Fragrances, Sowers Secrets, Odormann, Forest Mist, Cool Mist etc.
name: CHRYSANTHE NATURALS PRIVATE LIMITED
